name: KitKat Chocolate Orange
description: A perfect blend of smooth milk chocolate and refreshing orange flavour that makes for an utterly delicious treat.
ingredients: Orange Powder, Baking Soda, Cacao Mass, Cocoa Butter, Cocoa Powder, Emulsifier, Fragrance, Lactose, Sugar, Vegetable Fat, Wheat Flour, Whole Milk Powder, Yeast

name: Yaokin Salty Popcorn
description: Salty Popcorn by Yaokin is a small snack pack. Made with natural corn from the USA with crispy texture at its best. A combination of different natures makes a good snack to give you a good appetite. It can easily be one of your all time favourite snacks.
ingredients: Red Pepper, Amino Acid, Corn, Dextrin, Salt, Seasoning, Sugar, Vegetable Oil

name: Glico Pocky Matcha Chocolate
description: Pocky Matcha Chocolate with mild sweetness and rich flavour brings you the benefits of matcha and also the smell of Japan nature. Pocky chocolate is available with many flavours such as strawberry, almond, coconut and milk. Matcha Chocolate has always been one of the top sellers among Glico’s products.
ingredients: Wheat Flour, Sugar, Blend of Vegetable Oils(Palm Oil, Hydrogenated Palm Kernel Oil, Hydrogenated Palm Oil, Hydrogenated Rapeseed Oil), Whole Milk Powder, Lactose, Vegetable Oil Shortening(Palm Oil, Hydrogenated Palm Oil), Green Tea Powder, Artificial Flavors, Salt, Yeast, Soy Lecithin, Leavening(Sodium Bicarbonate), Mono- And Diglycerides of Fatty Acids, Beta-Carotene Color, Blue 1 Lake Color. Contains Wheat, Milk and Soybeans May Contain Almond and Coconut

name: Yaokin Peach Gummy
description: The packet of Peach Gummy is full of delicate aroma that remains in your nose for a while. There are 12 mini gummies in each bag and they easily melt with the warmth of the mouth.
ingredients: Concentrated Fruit Juice, Acidulant, Cellulose, Collagen, Fragrance, Glycerin, Potassium, Starch, Sugar, Vegetable Oil

name: Yaokin Green Apple Gummy
description: The packet of Apple Gummy is full of delicate aroma when opened. The aroma remains in your nose for a while. There are 12 mini gummies in each bag and they easily melt with the warmth of the mouth.
ingredients: Concentrated Fruit Juice, Acidulant, Cellulose, Collagen, Fragrance, Glycerin, Potassium, Starch, Sugar, Vegetable Oil
